span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;

}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg {

}

    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;

    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;

    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;
	font-family: 'Roboto';
	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;
    background: url(/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/inc.jpg) no-repeat left;

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {

}
.pkg-exc ul li {

<div class="cmsmasters_column one_first">
<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Scintillating Switzerland and Austria Tour</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/holidays-in-switzerland" title="Switzerland Tour Packages">Switzerland</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Scintillating Switzerland and Austria Tour</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c36b7365d90_76481626" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/switzerland-austria.jpg" alt="Switzerland Austria Tour Package" title="Switzerland Austria Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Exploring the charmingly whimsical landscape of this part of Europe is like a magical experience. With pristine lakes, lush green nature and a calming atmosphere a visit to these places in Europe will definitely rejuvenate your mind, body and soul. From the picturesque vistas to breathtaking beauty of nature this holiday package of Switzerland with Austria will be a one of kind experiences which you and your family will remember for a lifetime. Book yours now and take a trip to one of the most impeccable holiday destinations on the face of earth.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Switzerland Austria Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>India – Zurich – Engelberg</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>You will be flown from India to Zurich where on arrival you will be received by our tour representative at the airport. You will then be validated for your Swiss rail pass and be transferred to your hotel in Engelberg. This will be a breathtaking journey with stunning views of the surroundings. On arrival here you will be checked in to your hotel for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Excursion to Mt. Titlis</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having a delicious breakfast in the morning you will be made to head out for a day tour of the famous Mt. Titlis which can be reached after a picturesque journey up the hill on a cable car. After exploring the glacier park here and indulging in fun activities you will head out for spending your second half of the day in Lucerne. Her you will be taken on a city tour followed by a boat cruise on Lake Lucerne. You will then return back to your hotel in Engelberg for staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Excursion to Mt. Jungfrau</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After a healthy and hearty breakfast in the morning, you will be made to proceed for a visit to your next destination of Mt. Jungfrau. You will be made to board the train headed for Lauterbrunnen for a visit to the famous glacier falls. You will then be made to board the cog wheel train to Jungfraujoch i.e. the top of Europe and home to the highest railway station here. After spending some exciting time here you will be made to head back to your hotel here for staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Excursion to Bern and Mt. Rigi</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be taken for an excursion to the queen of mountains in Mt. Rigi. From the summit here you can witness the incredible surrounding beauty of the Alps. Then you will make your way to Bern which is the capital of Switzerland and a cultural hub. Finally, you will be made to return back to your hotel for staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Excursion to Geneva and Montreux</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Once you are done with your breakfast in the morning you will be made to board the train heading for Geneva – another amazing tourist attraction in Europe. Here you will be made to cover places like – floral clock, UN, Jet d’Eau etc. later on you will be made to board the train heading for Montreux where on reaching you will be made to visit the opulent medieval Chillon Castle. After this you will be made to head back to your hotel in Engelberg where you will be staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Excursion to Lugano</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having a delicious breakfast in the morning you will be made to head out for a sightseeing excursion of the Italian side of Switzerland i.e. Lugano. Then you can go on either a train ride of a cruise of Lake Lugano. After taking a miniature tour of Switzerland via a train ride you will be made to head back to your hotel here for staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Excursion to Zurich</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After a healthy and hearty breakfast meal in the morning, you will be made to board the train heading for Zurich. On reaching you will be made to go on a trolley experience which is a unique way of sightseeing for the city. Finally, after visiting the largest falls in Europe i.e. Rhine you will be made to head back to your hotel in Engelberg for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 8 :</span>Engelberg – Zurich – Innsbruck</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Once you are done with your breakfast in the morning you will be checked out of your hotel and made to board the train heading for Innsbruck. On reaching you will be checked in to your hotel where you will be spending the night. The remainder of your day will be free for you to go on a leisurely tour of the city.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 9 :</span>Innsbruck – Salzburg</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After finishing your breakfast in the morning you will be made to check out of your hotel here and made to proceed for boarding the train to Salzburg via a train journey. After completing 2 hours of journey you will be received by our tour representative who will transfer you to your allotted hotel in Salzburg where you will be staying for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 10 :</span>Sightseeing of Salzburg</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>This will be one of the most memorable days of your trip. After you are done with your breakfast in the morning your will be taken on sound of Music tour where you will be enjoying the stunning surrounding sceneries and breathtaking views of the magnificent surrounding landscape. The 2nd half of the day is at your leisure. You will be spending the night in Salzburg.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 11 :</span>Salzburg – Vienna</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After your breakfast in the morning, you will be made to check out of your hotel here and be made to board the train heading for Vienna which will be a train ride of 3 hours. On arrival in the mesmerizing city of Vienna, you will be transferred to your hotel here for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 12 :</span>Sightseeing of Vienna</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Once you are done with your breakfast in the morning you will be made to assist on a full day of city tour in Vienna including a visit to Schonbrunn Palace and other interesting sightseeing attraction points for tourists. After exploring the city you will be made to head back to your hotel in Vienna for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 13 :</span>Vienna Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Once you are done with your breakfast in the morning you will be made to check out of the hotel and head for the departure location at the airport here. Our tour representative will drop you off here hence ending the scintillating tour package of Switzerland and Austria.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="cmsmasters-icon-flight" aria-hidden="true"></i> Trip Highlights</h3>
<ul class="highlight-this-tour">
<li>Starting the tour with excursion to Mt. Titlis</li>
<li>Explore the glacier park on the mountain</li>
<li>Go for a boat cruise at Lake Lucerne</li>
<li>Take the cogwheel train to Jungfraujoch, Europe's highest point and home to the world's highest railway station.</li>
<li>A double excursion to Bern and Mt. Rigi</li>
<li>In Geneva visit floral clock, UN, Jet d’Eau</li>
<li>In Montreux visit the medieval Chillon Castle</li>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Switzerland Austria Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Is More Beautiful, Austria Or Switzerland?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Switzerland is famous for the beauty of its Alps, and while it is more expensive, it is worthwhile to visit. Austria has a more small-town feel, with shorter but equally breathtaking mountain peaks. Your money will go further here because it is less expensive than in Switzerland.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Is The Best Time To Visit Switzerland And Austria?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Travellers enjoy fewer crowds, mild weather, and the ability to book a room almost whenever and wherever they want in late May, June, September, and early October.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Is Austria So Well-Known For Tourism?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Beautiful mountain and lake landscapes, numerous cultural institutions, vibrant cities, exquisite delights, and friendly people await visitors. The Habsburg Empire shaped Austria's attractive cities with rich history and the internationally well-known "Austrian cuisine."</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Makes Switzerland Unique?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The majestic Alps, placid lakes, quaint villages, cosmopolitan cities, and towering castles are just some of the natural wonders that Switzerland has to offer. Shopping, wine tasting, and delectable chocolates and cheeses round out the experience.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The Swiss Food Culture Like?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> In general, basic food items include a wide variety of bread (white, whole wheat, and so on), dairy products such as milk, yoghurt, butter, and - of course - a wide variety of the world-famous Swiss cheese. Vegetables such as beans, carrots, cauliflower, potatoes, spinach, and so on are also important.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

	</div>
	<div class="itenBxt">
		<p><span id="wpcf7-673c36b73809d-wrapper" class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap website_fill-wrap" style="display:none !important; visibility:hidden !important;"><label for="wpcf7-673c36b73809d-field" class="hp-message">Please leave this field empty.</label><input id="wpcf7-673c36b73809d-field"  class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text" type="text" name="website_fill" value="" size="40" tabindex="-1" autocomplete="new-password" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-name"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Full Name*" value="" type="text" name="your-name" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-email"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-email wpcf7-validates-as-required wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-email" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Email Id*" value="" type="email" name="your-email" /></span>
		</p>
		<p class="sCntry"><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap your-country"><input class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-intl_tel wpcf7-intl-tel" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="in" data-initialcountry="in" data-preferredcountries="gb-in" value="" type="tel" name="your-country-cf7it-national" /><input name="your-country" type="hidden" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-full" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-name" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-name" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-code" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-code" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-iso2" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-iso2" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-phones"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-tel wpcf7-validates-as-required wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-tel" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="10 digit mobile number" value="" type="tel" name="your-phones" /></span>
		</p>
		<p><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-date"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Time of Travel*" value="" type="text" name="your-date" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-trMess"><textarea cols="40" rows="10" maxlength="140" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-textarea" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Write a description of your tour so we can design the best package for you!" name="your-trMess"></textarea></span>
		</p>
		<div>
			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Scintillating Switzerland and Austria Tour Home » International » Switzerland » Scintillating Switzerland and Austria Tour Tour Overview Exploring the charmingly whimsical landscape of this part of Europe is like a magical experience. With pristine lakes, lush green nature and a calming atmosphere a visit to these places in Europe will definitely rejuvenate your mind,...
